title: Man holding a banner with cucumbers attached to it
description: The man is holding peppers with messages written on them. Photographer's description: Pictures taken during the Egyptian Revolution. Text in image: الخيار الاستراتيجى الرحيل أو المحاكمة. Translation of Text in image: The strategic ultimatum, leaving or be put on trial.
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: Man holding a banner with cucumbers attached to it
